description: Travel insurance synthetic data template. Travel insurance helps protect travelers from unexpected medical expenses and other emergencies while traveling outside their home province or country. Coverage includes emergency medical care, trip interruption, flight delay assistance, and optional coverage for sports and activities.

PolicyID.description: Unique identifier for the travel insurance policy (e.g., TI-123456).

PolicyHolderDOB.description: Date of birth of the policyholder.

PolicyStartDate.description: Date when the travel insurance policy became effective.

PolicyEndDate.description: Date when the travel insurance policy expires.

Destination.description: Destination(s) of the trip covered under the policy.

CoverageType.description: Type of travel insurance coverage (Single Trip, Multi Trip, or Visitor to Canada).

EmergencyMedicalCoverage.description: Indicates whether emergency medical coverage is included in the policy.

TripInterruptionCoverage.description: Indicates whether trip interruption coverage is included in the policy.

FlightDelayAssistance.description: Indicates whether flight delay assistance is included, offering lounge access or payout if delayed over 2 hours.

SportsAndActivitiesCoverage.description: Indicates whether coverage for sports and extreme activities is included in the policy.

SuperVisaInsurance.description: Indicates whether Super Visa insurance is included for visitors to Canada.

MedicalEvacuationCoverage.description: Indicates whether medical evacuation coverage is included in the policy.

PolicyPremium.description: Total premium amount paid for the travel insurance policy.

PaymentPlan.description: The payment plan for the insurance premium (One-Time Payment or Installments).

PremiumAmount.description: Amount of premium paid for the policy, per installment or as a lump sum.

TripStartDate.description: Start date of the insured trip.

TripEndDate.description: End date of the insured trip.

TripLength.description: Duration of the trip covered by the policy (in days).

PolicyCoverageLimit.description: Maximum coverage limit for emergency medical expenses and other covered incidents.

FlightDelayDuration.description: Duration of the flight delay, in hours, that triggers assistance coverage.

ClaimStatus.description: Current status of the travel insurance claim (Approved, Pending, or Denied).

ClaimAmountPaid.description: Total amount paid out for claims made under the travel insurance policy.
